title: Disney+ Jockeys for First Place in the Streaming Wars | The Watch
description:
This week Disney announced all of the movies and TV shows that will be available on Disney+ (1:06); the streaming service is creating a relationship with subscribers before even launching (8:25). Plus: ‘Game of Thrones’ (20:52), ‘Bless This Mess’ (27:16), ‘Killing Eve’ (31:32), and ‘The OA’ (35:34).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Alison Herman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
